name: Taiga is Alive!
description:
Sergei was an ordinary hermit, who lived deep in russian taiga forests in peace with nature. But once, for unknown reason, taiga turned against him. She started mutating rapidly to kick Sergei from her homeland or even kill. Help Sergei get out of this dedaly place!

To move use WASD or arrows. Use Space for jump and Space+Space for double jump.

Assets used for this project:

  • https://vnitti.itch.io/taiga-asset-pack - tileset
  • https://thedeadrat.itch.io/8-bit-music - music
  • https://www.1001fonts.com/disposabledroid-bb-font.html - font for game
  • https://www.1001fonts.com/rubber-biscuit-font.html - font for cover
  • https://github.com/Brackeys/2D-Character-Controller - controller for character

p.s random is pretty weird, i'm still not sure if it is working or not.
